42688673546427.name: Chocolate Cigars - 24ct
42688673546427.desc: Back in the day, no trip to the delivery room was complete without a celebratory cigar. Nowadays, you can spread the joy of the birth of a new baby in a yummier and healthier way with these Chocolate Cigars. They are an innocent and delicious way to celebrate any exciting occasion, look official in their bright, gold wrappers, and come in traditional, little boxes that resemble the humidors of old. In every amazing box, you can enjoy rich, melty chocolate that's perfect for celebrating a growing family. Puff, savor, and celebrate with every delicious chocolate cigar in this bulk selection.

42689173553339.name: Gold Chocolate Coins - 6lb Bulk
42689173553339.desc:
Embark on a delectable adventure with our Gold Chocolate Coins. These chocolate gold coins are more than just a treat; they're a journey into the delightful world of candy craftsmanship by the esteemed R.M. Palmer Company. Each coin is a treasure trove of creamy, rich chocolate enveloped in brilliant gold candy foil, offering a unique blend of visual appeal and irresistible taste.
These shimmering coins serve as the perfect pirate candy for themed parties, bringing a touch of authenticity that is bound to delight both children and adults alike. They also shine as a coveted treasure in celebrations like St. Patrick's Day, adding a dash of golden charm and delicious whimsy to your festivities. 
Dive into this bulk pack of chocolate gold coins, and experience the sweet, satisfying richness that your wallet will never know. Your taste buds will thank you though!

42688417333435.name: Hershey's Kisses - 4lb
42688417333435.desc: Show some love with our bulk Hershey kisses! Few candies are as recognizable as the familiar cone shape that is the trademark of these chocolate treats. They are simply yet extremely versatile. Hand them out at parties, use them to fill your candy dish at home or add them to party or wedding favors. No matter where you are or what the occasion may be, guests will savor the sweet taste and unique shape that has earned these charming confections enormous popularity. Every Hershey kiss candy is covered in a silver foil wrapper. Simply peel back the top and enjoy the full, rich flavor that comes with every dainty bite! Our bulk candy packages are the most convenient way to order your Hershey kisses in large quantities for gatherings and events. You can also purchase a pack or two for baking around the holidays so you always have enough to make your favorite Hershey cookies!

42688864059579.name: Mini Chocolate Cars - 100ct
42688864059579.desc: These mini cars are so much fun, you'll want to eat them up! Each includes a solid milk chocolate that's shaped like a miniature car that's similar to the ones children love to play with. The outside is covered by a stylish wrapper that includes realistic car details, with a windshield, doors, and more in white, yellow, blue, red, and black. Our bulk chocolate cars box contains many pieces that are perfect for birthday parties and gift giving!

42688515113147.name: Red Roses Solid Chocolate - 48ct
42688515113147.desc: Designed to look like a real, red rose, these foil wrapped Solid Chocolate Roses are equal parts romantic and yummy! Wine and dine your sweetheart and cap off the night by giving her a bouquet of Solid Chocolate Roses. Not only are they thoughtful, but she'll be able to enjoy the look and taste of this edible flower. These Solid Chocolate Roses also make great additions to Valentine's Day gift baskets, Mother's Day gifts, anniversary dinners, first dates, and anything else that calls for something extra special and extra delicious!A rose by any other name would never smell as sweet! That's because these Solid Chocolate Roses are the best of the best.

42688506855611.name: Milk Chocolate Exotic Fish - 5lb
42688506855611.desc: Make your day sweeter with these fun little chocolate fish! There are so many ways to enjoy these aquatic candies. Each piece consists of a solid portion of milk chocolate that's shaped into a basic fish, with broad body and charming fins. To complement the distinctive shape, each is wrapped in brilliant foil printed in an exotic fish pattern. Every happy little fish is unique with a wide variety of exciting color combinations! What can you do with our milk chocolate exotic fish? Anything! Enjoy them as a sweet snack at home or put them in a glass dish and impress guests with their foil shimmer. These playful fishes also look amazing when used in wedding favors and treat bags. Add them to tulle or netting to complement a nautical or seaside theme. Adults and children alike will adore their pleasant smiles almost as much as they enjoy the rich taste of smooth milk chocolate!

42689199276219.name: Chocolate Flower Candies - 5lb
42689199276219.desc: Chocolate flower candies are just as delicious as they are elegant. This unique confection features a gorgeous look that will dress up any candy dish or dessert table. Each piece is made of high quality milk chocolate that's shaped into a solid disc. Each round coin piece is covered in a layer of shimmering foil with a dazzling floral pattern. Our assortment features light pink and red flowers with stylish green leaves and pink, green, silver and purple background. Keep our chocolate flower candies on hand as an easy snack you can serve guests who happen by. They look fabulous at tea parties and brunches. Balance one on a saucer with a tea cup or place at table settings for a fancy dinner. These flower chocolates are also a beautiful choice for DIY wedding favors. Pour into tulle bags or a small gift box or use them to put the finishing touches on a summer or spring celebration!Approximately 55 pieces per pound
